question: Which state government has tied up with the Indian Railways for logistics and door-step delivery of Litchi and Mango fruits?
explanation:
The Horticulture Department of Bihar has partnered with the Postal Department of the Indian Government for online booking and delivery at doorstep facility
 The ''Shahi Lichi'' of Muzaffarpur, Bihar and "Zardalu Mango" of Bhagalpur, Bihar are famous in the country for their unique fragrance and taste. As the cultivators find it difficult to transport the fruits to the markets for sale, this online booking has been launched. People can place order on the website of the stateâ€™s horticulture department.
